adventure_overview: This Adventure is the highlight for many Cub Scouts. The Pinewood Derby® and Raingutter Regatta™ are two popular Cub Scout races. The best part about these races is getting to design and build your own car or boat. You may want to design your car or boat for looks, or you may want to go for speed; either way, have fun spending time with your family making your car or boat or both. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: With an adult, build either a Pinewood Derby® car or a Raingutter Regatta™ boat.

activities.name: Pinewood Derby® Car Build Day Wolf
activities.description: Den or pack provides a build day for Cub Scouts.

activities.name: Raingutter Regatta™ Boat Build Day Wolf
activities.description: Den or pack provides a build day for Cub Scouts.

requirements.text: Learn the rules of the race for the vehicle chosen in requirement 1.

activities.name: Pinewood Rule Scramble Wolf
activities.description: Learn the race rules for the Pinewood Derby®.

activities.name: Raingutter Rule Scramble Wolf
activities.description: Learn the race rules for the Raingutter Regatta™.

requirements.text: Identify how you could increase the speed of your chosen vehicle.

activities.name: Pace Car Speed Wolf
activities.description: Cub Scouts will identify three ways to make their Pinewood Derby® car go faster.

activities.name: Speed Boat Wolf
activities.description: Cub Scouts identify three ways to make Raingutter Regatta™ boats go faster.

requirements.text: Before the race, discuss with your den how you will demonstrate good sportsmanship during the race.

activities.name: Sportsmanship Wolf
activities.description: Cub Scouts review good sportsmanship before the race

requirements.text: Participate in a Pinewood Derby® or a Raingutter Regatta™.

activities.name: Pinewood Derby® Race Wolf
activities.description: Conduct a Pinewood Derby® car race.
